title: Top Places to visit in Pherzawl, Manipur
content:
Pherzawl is a district of Manipur state in India.
Pherzawl village is the headquarter of the Pherzawl District of Manipur, India. Pherzawl district was created by bifurcating Churachandpur district..
Pherzawl is also the Sub-Divisional headquarter of Pherzawl Sub-Division, one of
